Package civitas.celestis.graphics.util

Class Colors

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.util.Colors
public final class Colors extends Object
Contains utility methods related to AWT colors.

    • random

      @Nonnull public static Color random()
      Returns a random color with an alpha of 1.0 (opaque).
      Returns:
      A random opaque color

    • average

      @Nonnull public static Color average(@Nonnull Color c1, @Nonnull Color c2, double w1, double w2)
      Calculates the weighted average of two colors.
      Parameters:
      c1 - The first color
      c2 - The second color
      w1 - The first color's weight
      w2 - The second color's weight
      Returns:
      The weighted average of the two colors

    • average

      Calculates the simple average of two colors.
      Parameters:
      c1 - The first color
      c2 - The second color
      Returns:
      The simple average of the two colors
